title: iTunes controls are missing from the Lock screen
content: The Itunes controls that are usually on the Lock screen are missing now. I've had the phone for 2 years and last week it disappeared.  Which now means I have to unlock the phone to change tracks.   Ive looked at notifications for iTunes and it all looks good.  On Lock Screen notifications is set to all.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
